name: Nayyar Labels
overview:
Established in the year 1980, at Ludhiana (Punjab, India), we, “Nayyar Labels”, are the well-established organization engaged in manufacturing and supplying an exclusive assortment of Tags & Labels. Our offered range includes Tags, Labels, Satin Labels, Printed Labels, Wash Care Labels, Woven Labels etc. Our offered range of labels is manufactured using the optimum quality raw material and advance technology and these are designed with high precision to meet the set industry quality standards.

Infrastructure: Our huge infrastructural facility makes us capable to handle bulk orders of the market and clients within the promised time frame. We have established a marvelous infrastructure framework and other facilities which assist us to carry out our business operations in a well organized manner.

Our Quality: Being a quality centric firm, we emphasize on offering the best quality products to our precious clients. We have recruited a experienced team of quality experts conduct various crucial tests on quality parameters using hi-tech testing devices and tools.

Our Team: Due to the efforts of our experienced and skilled teams of professionals, we have earned a good reputation in the sector of manufacturing and supplying the superior quality range of labels. Rich domain expertise and industry experience are assisting us in meeting the various requirements of market as well as of our valuable clients in the most efficient manner.

Why Us?: Quality Standard Customization facility Competitive prices Prompt delivery
